short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests keyboard shortcuts for browser actions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Shortcut Suggester*
Boost your productivity and streamline your workflow with Shortcut Suggester! This handy Chrome extension suggests keyboard shortcuts for common actions you perform using your mouse. Whether you're copying, pasting, or opening a new tab, Shortcut Suggester will provide you with the keyboard shortcuts you could use instead, helping you save time and work more efficiently.

Key Features
~Real-Time Suggestions: Get instant notifications with keyboard shortcuts as you perform actions using the mouse.
~Comprehensive Shortcut Library: Covers a wide range of common browser and application shortcuts, including copy, paste, cut, undo, redo, and more.
~Minimal and Non-Intrusive: Designed to be lightweight and non-intrusive, so it doesn't disrupt your browsing experience.
~Enhanced Productivity: Learn and adopt efficient keyboard shortcuts to enhance your productivity and reduce dependency on the mouse.
*Benefits*
~Increase Efficiency: Save time by learning and using keyboard shortcuts for common tasks.
~Improve Workflow: Seamlessly integrate keyboard shortcuts into your daily browsing and work routines.
~User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to start using keyboard shortcuts.
~Privacy-Focused: No data tracking or third-party cookies. Your privacy is our priority.
*How It Works*
Install Shortcut Suggester: Add the extension to your Chrome browser.
Perform Actions: Use your mouse to perform common actions like copy, paste, cut, etc.
Receive Suggestions: When a mouse action is detected, a small notification will appear suggesting the relevant keyboard shortcut.
Adopt Shortcuts: Start using the suggested shortcuts to save time and improve your workflow.
Usage Examples
Copy (Ctrl+C): Highlight text and right-click to copy. Shortcut Suggester will remind you to use Ctrl+C.
Paste (Ctrl+V): Right-click to paste copied text or content. Shortcut Suggester will suggest Ctrl+V.
New Tab (Ctrl+T): Click the new tab button. Shortcut Suggester will recommend Ctrl+T.
Close Tab (Ctrl+W): Close a tab using the mouse. Shortcut Suggester will show Ctrl+W.
Feedback and Support
We are committed to providing the best user experience. If you have any feedback, suggestions, or issues, please contact us at Email: eledit6600@gmail.com.
